div.p: A Master Patient Index (MPI) assessment of whether a candidate patient record is a match or not.
This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-mpi-match, which defines the following codes:

tr.td: This record meets the MPI criteria to be automatically considered as a full match.
This record is a close match, but not a certain match. Additional review (e.g. by a human) may be required before using this as a match.
This record may be a matching one. Additional review (e.g. by a human) SHOULD be performed before using this as a match.

This record is known not to be a match. Note that usually non-matching records are not returned, but in some cases records previously or likely considered as a match may specifically be negated by the MPI.

description.value: A Master Patient Index (MPI) assessment of whether a candidate patient record is a match or not.

definition.value: This record meets the MPI criteria to be automatically considered as a full match.
This record is a close match, but not a certain match. Additional review (e.g. by a human) may be required before using this as a match.
This record may be a matching one. Additional review (e.g. by a human) SHOULD be performed before using this as a match.

This record is known not to be a match. Note that usually non-matching records are not returned, but in some cases records previously or likely considered as a match may specifically be negated by the MPI.
